name: A Night On The Farm
description:
A Night On The Farm is an atmospheric, first-person, retro-inspired, horror adventure with deep lore and surprising plot twists. Uncover the mystery surrounding your crashed car and the farm’s inescapable draw. Discover cryptic notes and audio logs as you gain access to [REDACTED] and make decisions that alter the story’s outcome!

Gameplay Features
  • Interactive, first-person gameplay, focused on story and exploration.
  • Unlock doors, access computer terminals, and explore eerie environments to see just how deep the rabbit hole goes.
  • Discover fully-voiced cassette tapes, strange toys, and other optional items that flesh out the game's lore.
  • Atmospheric lighting, particle effects, and sound design bring eerie Autumn visuals to life.
  • Lo-Fi, pixelated, PS1 / early 2000’s-inspired graphics.
  • Multiple endings!
  • Cloud Saves
